comment: Super sweet, super easy. We use the book in class, but all the homework's online so you can get away with sharing during class. Extremely scattered and very unclear on her expectations, but as a result she often will give you A's for things you didn't even do. She's willing to help you with whatever, but it didn't actually improve my French much.

She is very kind and understanding. Her class is not too difficult and she is very helpful with pronunciation. She speaks a lot of French in the class, but always stops to make sure everyone understands. Lots of textbook use, and mandatory online homework. The tests are pretty easy as well as the essays and presentations.

Prof Vainer is a very patient with her students...she wants you to succeed and gives you help whenever requested..also use the Lang Lab...she checks your essays for errors, rtn to you for correction before grading....fun professor...assists you in pununciation of the words...her stories are sometimes funny too!

Great teacher. Wants students to succeed. Homework is important,written assignments are checked for errors and students correct before being graded.Was disorganized at times, but wonderful teacher. Will work with you if you need it.

If you want an A you can have an A. If you want to learn French you can learn French. If you want both you can have both. All you have to do is ask. Miss an assignment? Just get it in when you can. Trouble on a test? Just do some extra credit. This class is fun and easy. I had 2 other French Profs and have learned more from her than them combined!

Vainer loves her students & what she does--she is kind and patient.  Two areas for improvement:  more structure & for me I would have rather she only spoke French all of the time. She mostly did but when she tries to convey things in English students become confused. I think too in some ways she is too lenient with deadlines on hw/assignments.
Love her!!! She works with you on turning in hw/essays/ etc. She makes French grammer fun and easy. Take her!

Vainer is very nice. she is always willing to give extra help and loves her students. she is very easy but you should do your work. if you show youre trying youll get a B instead of an A, etc. I made an A in 2001 and 2002..not sure if I deserved it..more like a B+. make sure you email her if you have any concerns with hw, shell give you credit.

I have had Prof. Vainer more than once and she is AWESOME. She'll go way out of her way to help you and your French will improve as a result. She really cares about her students and she is a genuine person. Plus, her accent is very pleasant to listen to. Easily one of the best professors at KSU. TAKE HER!!!!
I LOVE HER! thats all there is too it.... oh and she is the best professor of all time.You can call her the Queen of French... she has some of the funniest stories to tell you so don't miss out.
advantage because she actually is from france. she's lenient which is awesome when you're first learning a language. she tells you exactly what will be on the tests as well as the essay.
Really cool teacher. The class is mostly grammar so it's bound to be hard, but she makes it as painless as possible. I was expecting a C but ended up with an A. I love Vainer

Amazing French professor. You will love coming to class and enjoy what she has to teach. She grades lightly and understands that the students are American. Take her for any French class you can. A really easy A or B, especially if you enjoy the language.

Wonderful prof....has a lot of funny stories to tell. She is passionate about the language and can connect with the students. Very attentive to students problems and will work with you one on one. Tons of extra credit, paper revisions... SHE WILL HELP YOU GET THE BEST GRADE POSSIBLE!

She's absolutely amazing. The nicest, most relatable teacher ever. Very lenient and easy tests if you study for them. She takes her time to get to know you as a person. LOVE HER!!!! I want to take her again!

She is an AMAZING teacher! Friendly, easy to relate to, and really cares about her students!! TAKE THIS TEACHER and your sure to get an A. She gives TONS of extra credit, and goes straight from the book. I loved her and i would take her again in a second!! :-)

Ms. Vainer is a sweetheart. She is a native speaker and she really loves teaching the language. She goes out of her way to help her students and you can tell that she's really pulling for her students to do well. Also she makes French as easy as it can be. I thoroughly enjoyed having her.

the BEST frech college professor!!! she is from paris so she has the PERFECT french accent.  she goes out of her way to help her students.  gives a lot of extra credit.  DO NOT leave blank spaces on her tests...just TRY! if you are having trouble, talk to her and she will help you succeed.  I WILL TAKE HER AGAIN anytime. A++++++++

Vainer's class was not too bad. There are a few essays which she will correct and allow you to correct for a better grade. The tests are not difficult at all and it is easy to study straight from the book. The info in 1002 is a little bit difficult, but she has no problem working with the class until everyone understands. great teacher

She is awesome. You will learn a lot without feeling pressured. Her tests are pretty easy as long as you study for them. She is willing to help in anyway she can. On a side note, she is so cute and funny. She tells great little stories whilst giggling!

Very good prof!! She is originally from france so her accent is excellent if you want 2 practice ur listening skills. Her tests are not hard at all, and she is always willing to help. Wonderful person!! I definetly recommend her :)
